titles: Seuen dayes conference betweene a catholicke christian, and a catholicke Romane. Concerning some controuersies of religion. By William Cowper, B. of Galloway.

publisher: Printed by W. S[tansby] for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shop at the South doore of Paules, and Britaines Bursse,
